name: tech-blog-cms
description: A full stack, from scratch build, that allows users to manage content (view, create, edit & delete posts) on a tech blog. Server & RESTful API w/ node.js & express.js. Database w/ MySQL2 & Sequelize, View templating w/ express-handlebars, security w/ dotenv & bcrypt, authentication w/ express-session & connect-session-sequelize. MVC architecture.
